パッケージ org.meganekkovr

Meganekko core classes.

参照先: 説明

  • インタフェースのサマリー 
    インタフェース 説明
    LookDetectorComponent.LookListener  
  • クラスのサマリー 
    クラス 説明
    CameraComponent
    CameraComponent updates its Entity's rotation to head tracking rotation in every frame.
    Component
    Component is a basic class in Meganekko.
    Entity
    Entity is a basic class in Meganekko.
    FrameInput
    Native ovrFrameInput wrapper.
    GearVRActivity  
    GeometryComponent
    This gives geometry to Entity for rendering.
    JoyButton
    Copied from VrAppFramework/Include/Input.h
    KeyCode
    Manually coped from VrAppFramework/Input.h enum ovrKeyCode.
    KeyEventType
    Copied from Input.h enum KeyEventType
    LookDetector  
    LookDetectorComponent
    This notifies whether user is looking at Entity or not.
    MeganekkoApp  
    Scene  
    SurfaceRendererComponent
    This gives appearance to Entity for rendering.
    SurfaceRendererComponent.CanvasRenderer  
    SurfaceRendererComponent.DrawableRenderer  
    SurfaceRendererComponent.ViewRenderer  
  • 列挙型のサマリー 
    列挙型 説明
    SurfaceRendererComponent.StereoMode
